title: 9-year-old shot in north county
content:
ST. LOUIS COUNTY -- A 9-year-old child is recovering after being shot in the foot with a rifle.
It happened around 10:30 Sunday night at the Cloverfield Apartments in north St. Louis County. A 10-year-old girl was trying to find a video game controller in the couch cushions, but found an AR-15 rifle instead. She accidentally pulled the trigger, shooting a 9-year-old girl nearby.
The 9-year-old sustained non-life threatening injuries and remains in stable condition.
The St. Louis County Police Department Bureau of Crimes Against Persons is investigating.
